resources.string: This application can be used to access your Syncze Watch anytime and view its current location. The live location will be updated every 5 minutes. To view the areas the wearer has been to, click "Past Records". 24 hours worth of location tracking will be stored in the database. It will be cleared the next day.
Create a Geofence by entering the address below. Only 1 geofence can be created at a time.
You will receive a notification if the wearer enters/exit the geofence area.
